data.title: Tuition & Expenses
data.text:
Whitworth's Doctor of Physical Therapy program tuition for the 2025-26 academic year is $1,100 per credit. The total anticipated cost to complete the eight-semester program is $129,765*.

Scholarships will be available; additional costs include: initial background check, annual immunization and medical costs, health insurance, CPR-related costs, physical therapy kit, polo shirt and graduation fee.

Year One

Year Two
